summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 22, Sea View Park Addition, being the alley between 45th Avenue Southwest and 46th Avenue Southwest from West Findlay Street to West Juneau Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 17195 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
